code: import*as axios from"axios";var baseUrl="http://localhost:5000/";var instance=axios.create({baseUrl:baseUrl,headers:{"x-auth-token":""}});export var testAPI={getMyUsers:function getMyUsers(){return axios.get("http://localhost:5000/users").then(function(response){return response.data;});},getGoods:function getGoods(token){return axios.get("http://localhost:5000/goods",{headers:{"x-auth-token":token}}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},login:function login(email,password){return axios.post("http://localhost:5000/auth/",{email:email,password:password});},register:function register(name,email,password){return axios.post("http://localhost:5000/users",{name:name,email:email,password:password});},getAuth:function getAuth(token){return instance.get("http://localhost:5000/auth/user",{headers:{"x-auth-token":token}});}};
